title: Open a modal dialog in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Add Delivery Address' button, open the dialog.

title: Close a modal dialog in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Street' input inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.

title: Close a modal dialog using a button  in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Cancel' button inside a modal dialog, activate the button to close the dialog.

title: Navigate to the last focusable element in a modal dialog in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Street' input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the 'Cancel' button in the same dialog.

title: Navigate to the first focusable element in a modal dialog in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Cancel' button inside a modal dialog, navigate to the 'Street' input in the same dialog.

title: Navigate to the beginning of a modal dialog in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Street' input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the beginning of the dialog.

title: Navigate to the end of a modal dialog in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Street' input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the end of the dialog.

title: Open a nested modal dialog  in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Add' button inside a modal dialog, open the nested 'Address Added' dialog.

title: Close a nested modal dialog in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Close' button inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.

title: Close a nested modal dialog using a button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Close' button inside a modal dialog, activate the button to close the dialog.

title: Open a nested modal dialog using a link in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'your profile' link inside a modal dialog, open the nested 'End of the Road!' dialog.
